name: torpedo
description: Torpedo is multiprotocol bot written in Go
full_description:
Source code: https://github.com/tb0hdan/torpedo
Running:

docker run --name torpedo-mongo -d mongo
docker run --name torpedo --link torpedo-mongo:mongo --env-file ./env.list -p 3978:3978 -p 3979:3979 -p 3980:3980 -p 3981:3981 tb0hdan/torpedo


WARNING WARNING WARNING:

Do not supply 'MONGO' environment variable when running linked docker containers, application
will use $MONGO_PORT_27017_TCP_ADDR.

env.list contents:

SLACK="xxxttt,aaabbb"
TELEGRAM="xxx,yyy"
JABBER="user@host.com:supersecret,user2@anotherhost.com:a1FvH12"
SKYPE="app_id:app_password,app_id2:app_password2"
SENTRY_DSN="https://xxx:yyy"
FACEBOOK="aaabbb:ccc"
KIK="ddd:eee"
LINE="chat_secret:chat_token"

Optional, at least one
SLACK='xxxttt,aaabbb'
TELEGRAM='xxx,yyy'
JABBER='user@host.com:supersecret,user2@anotherhost.com:a1FvH12'
SKYPE='app_id:app_password,app_id2:app_password2'
SENTRY_DSN='https://xxx:yyy'

Mandatory
LASTFM_KEY='aaa'
LASTFM_SECRET='bbb'
GOOGLE_WEBAPP_KEY='ccc'
PINTEREST='ddd'
